changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_investment_seq; create table if not exists campaign_investment ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_investment_pkey primary key, invested_amount bigint, auth_id bigint constraint campaign_investment_fk_on_auth references auth, campaign_id bigint constraint campaign_investment_fk_on_campaign references campaign, investment_state_id bigint constraint campaign_investment_fk_on_investment_state references investment_state, creation_date timestamp DEFAULT localtimestamp NOT NULL );
